name: kibana
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 0.5 CPU | 2048 MB MEM
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Kibana service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at {{documentation-path}}uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
